intro: I design and build analytics solutions, data‑driven applications, and software systems that support real decisions. From concept to execution.

services.title: Data Analytics
services.description: From data gathering, exploratory analysis to decision‑support models, I help organizations understand what their data is really telling them. It's not business intelligence, it's business insights and predictions. Statistical analysis with most advanced mathematical models and techniques.

services.title: Software & Data Apps
services.description: Full‑stack development of analytics‑driven applications, from Database design, APIs, and automation pipelines deployed in production environments. React, Node.js, Python, SQL, R, SAS, and much more. I build software that turns data into actionable insights and seamless user experiences.

services.title: Database & Systems Design
services.description: Robust data models and architectures designed for scalability, maintainability, and business evolution. I walk hand in hand with clients to understand their needs and design systems that grow with them.
